T03D3787:14a-0: @14a * // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

T03D3787:17b-41: bzhon pa bkod ma'i chu dang ni //

T03D3787:17b-43: rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
T03D3787:17b-44: zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
T03D3787:18a-0: @18a * // de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed
T03D3787:18a-1: pa dang po 'dun pa dang ldan pa ni sa
T03D3787:18a-2: lta bu'o // sh'a ri'i bu 'di la byang chub
T03D3787:18a-3: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rnam
T03D3787:18a-4: pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
T03D3787:18a-5: bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3787:18a-6: pa la brtson par bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin te
T03D3787:18a-7: lta bu'o // / chos thams cad rnam pa thams
T03D3787:18a-8: cad du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod
T03D3787:18a-9: pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang de'i
T03D3787:18a-10: tshogs bskyed pa'i gzhir gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3787:18a-11: gnyis pa bsam pa dang ldan pa ni gser bzang po lta bu'o //
T03D3787:18a-12: sh'a ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
T03D3787:18a-13: dpa' chen pos gnas pa med pa'i tshul du shes
T03D3787:18a-14: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te
T03D3787:18a-15: / sbyin pa dang gtong ba dang yongs su len pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir /
T03D3787:18a-16: yongs su btang ba med pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i
T03D3787:18a-17: pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o
T03D3787:18a-19: de bzhin du chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir
T03D3787:18a-20: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
T03D3787:18a-21: rdzogs par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa
T03D3787:18a-22: ste / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis bsdu
T03D3787:18a-23: ba'i phan pa dang bde ba'i bsam pa ni yang
T03D3787:18a-24: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du gnas
T03D3787:18a-25: pas na bsam pa yin pa'i phyir ma 'ongs pa
T03D3787:18a-26: dang 'di la rnam par 'gyur ba mi bsten pa'i
T03D3787:18a-27: ste / phyir ro // gsum pa lhag pa'i bsam
T03D3787:18a-28: pa dang ldan pa ni yar ngo'i zla ba tshes
T03D3787:18a-29: ste / phyir ro // pa lta bu'o // des
T03D3787:18a-30: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
T03D3787:18a-31: te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa
T03D3787:18a-32: bdun bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba nas /
T03D3787:18a-33: mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes dgu bsgom par bya ba'i bar dang /
T03D3787:18a-34: skyes bu chen po'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad bsgom par bya ba'i par dang /
T03D3787:18a-35: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom
T03D3787:18a-36: par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa ste
T03D3787:18a-37: / dge ba'i chos thams cad rnam par 'phel bar
T03D3787:18a-38: 'gyur bar bsam pa lhag pa yin pa'i phyir lhag
T03D3787:18a-39: pa'i bsam pa zhes bya bas so //
T03D3787:18a-40: bzhi pa sbyor ba dang ldan pa ni me lta bu'o //
T03D3787:18b-0: @18b thams cad shes pa nyid la shes pa dang mthong bas bltas nas 'da' bar 'dod pa dang /
T03D3787:18b-1: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'dod pa dang /
T03D3787:18b-2: lam shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pa
T03D3787:18b-3: dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su
T03D3787:18b-4: 'thob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen pos
T03D3787:18b-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab
T03D3787:18b-6: par bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa ste /
T03D3787:18b-7: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi sbyor ba ni
T03D3787:18b-8: mchog tu gyur pa'i sbyor ba rab tu sbyor ba
T03D3787:18b-9: yin pas na bud shing gi khyad par gyis me
T03D3787:18b-10: bzhin du gong nas gong du khyad par du 'gro
T03D3787:18b-11: ba'i phyir ro // lnga pa sbyin pa'i pha rol
T03D3787:18b-12: tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ni gter chen po
T03D3787:18b-13: ba'i phyir ro // lta bu'o // sems can ser
T03D3787:18b-14: sna can rnams sbyin pa la 'jog par 'dod pa
T03D3787:18b-15: ba'i phyir ro // lta bu'o // dang / nyan
T03D3787:18b-16: thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa rnams sems
T03D3787:18b-17: bskyed pa gcig gi zil gyis mnan par 'dod pa'i
T03D3787:18b-18: byang chub sems dpa' chen pos zhes gang gsungs pa
T03D3787:18b-19: ba'i phyir ro // lta bu'o // dang / ste
T03D3787:18b-20: / zang zing gi longs spyod kyis sems can tshad
T03D3787:18b-21: med pa tshim par byed kyang yongs su gtugs pa
T03D3787:18b-23: drug pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3787:18b-24: dang ldan pa ni rin po che'i 'byung gnas lta
T03D3787:18b-25: bu'o // tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams tshul khrims la 'jog par 'dod pa dang /
T03D3787:18b-27: rang sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims rnams rjes su yi
T03D3787:18b-28: rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gi
T03D3787:18b-29: zil gyis mnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3787:18b-30: chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3787:18b-31: la bslab par bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa ste /
T03D3787:18b-32: yon tan rin po che mtha' yas pa thams cad ni de las 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3787:18b-33: bdun pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ni rgya mtsho chen po lta bu'o //
T03D3787:18b-34: gnod sems dang ldan pa rnams bzod pa la 'jog par 'dod pa dang /
T03D3787:18b-36: rang sangs rgyas kyi bzod pa rjes su yi rang
T03D3787:18b-37: ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gi zil
T03D3787:18b-38: gyis mnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen
T03D3787:18b-39: pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
T03D3787:19a-2: mi 'dod pa thog tu babs pa thams cad kyis 'khrug par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3787:19a-3: brgyad pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ni rdo rje lta bu'o //
T03D3787:19a-4: le lo can dag brtson 'grus la 'jog par 'dod pa dang /
T03D3787:19a-6: rang sangs rgyas kyi brtson 'grus rjes su yi rang
T03D3787:19a-7: ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gi zil
T03D3787:19a-8: gyis mnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen
T03D3787:19a-9: pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
T03D3787:19a-10: bslab par bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa ste /
T03D3787:19a-11: de ni yid brtan pas mi phyed pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3787:19a-12: dgu pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ni ri'i rgyal po lta bu'o //
T03D3787:19a-13: sems rnam par g-yengs pa rnams bsam gtan la 'jog bar 'dod pa dang /
T03D3787:19a-15: rang sangs rgyas kyi bsam gtan rjes su yi rang
T03D3787:19a-16: ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gi zil
T03D3787:19a-17: gyis mnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen
T03D3787:19a-18: pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
T03D3787:19a-19: bslab par bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa ste /
T03D3787:19a-20: de ni dmigs pa'i rnam par g-yeng bas mi bskyod pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3787:19a-21: bcu pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ni sman lta bu'o //
T03D3787:19a-22: sems can shes rab 'chal pa rnams shes rab la rab tu 'jog par 'dod pa dang /
T03D3787:19a-24: rang sangs rgyas kyi shes rab rnams rjes su yi
T03D3787:19a-25: rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gi
T03D3787:19a-26: zil gyis mnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3787:19a-27: chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3787:19a-28: la bslab par bya'o zhes gsungs pa ste /
T03D3787:19a-29: de ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i
T03D3787:19a-30: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin
T03D3787:19a-31: pa'i phyir ro // bcu gcig pa thabs mkhas pa'i
T03D3787:19a-32: pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa ni dge
T03D3787:19a-34: dge ba'i sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang thams cad
T03D3787:19a-35: mkhyen par yongs su bsngos pas mi zad par byed
T03D3787:19a-37: sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dmyal ba
T03D3787:19a-38: dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten
T03D3787:19a-39: gyi sdug bsngal bzod par 'dod pa dang /
T03D3787:19b-0: bskal @19b pa brgya stong du yang dag par bsags
T03D3787:19b-1: pa'i tshul khrims kyang sems can la ltos nas 'dor
T03D3787:19b-3: sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye bar 'dod pa'i byang
T03D3787:19b-4: chub sems dpa' chen pos zhes gang gsungs pa ste
T03D3787:19b-5: / de ni gnas skabs thams cad du sems can
T03D3787:19b-6: gyi don yongs su mi gtong ba yin pa'i phyir
T03D3787:19b-7: / ro // 'dir kha cig na re bden pa
T03D3787:19b-8: dang gtong ba dang shes rab nye bar zhi ba
T03D3787:19b-9: la brten pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs yin
T03D3787:19b-11: gzhan dag ni mthong ba'i lam gyis bsdus pas la 'jug pa'i sems yin te /
T03D3787:19b-12: 'di ltar mdo las gang gi tshe sems bskyed pa
T03D3787:19b-13: dang lhan cig skyes pa na byang chub sems dpa'i
T03D3787:19b-14: rigs su 'gyur ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
T03D3787:19b-15: yin no zhes gsungs pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes
T03D3787:19b-16: zer ro // gzhan dag ni da ltar byung ba'i
T03D3787:19b-17: sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du phyogs par gnas pa'i
T03D3787:19b-18: ting nge 'dzin dang snying rje chen po gnyis ni
T03D3787:19b-19: sangs rgyas kyi rigs yin no zhes 'dod do //
T03D3787:19b-20: la la dag ni sangs rgyas kyis bcas pa'i bslab pa la bya bar 'dod do //
T03D3787:19b-21: kha cig ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bya'o zhes zer ro //
T03D3787:19b-22: gzhan ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yum ni
T03D3787:19b-23: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no
T03D3787:19b-24: // yab ni thabs mkhas pa yin pas /
T03D3787:19b-25: de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs yin no zhes 'dod do //
T03D3787:19b-26: bcu gnyis pa smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3787:19b-27: pa dang ldan pa ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu
T03D3787:19b-28: lta bu'o // sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su sgrub par 'dod pa dang /
T03D3787:19b-29: phyogs bcu re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mtha'
T03D3787:19b-30: yas par chos ston pas go bar byed par 'dod

T03D3787:19b-32: par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang gsungs
T03D3787:19b-33: pa dang / pa ste / de ni ji ltar
T03D3787:19b-34: smon pa'i 'bras bu 'grub pa yin pa'i phyir ro
T03D3787:19b-35: pa dang / pa ste / // bcu gsum pa
T03D3787:19b-36: stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa
T03D3787:19b-38: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can
T03D3787:19b-39: thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod
T03D3787:19b-40: pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang gsungs pa
T03D3787:20a-1: de ni gdul bya'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3787:20a-2: bcu bzhi pa ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3787:20a-3: pa dang ldan pa sgra dbyangs snyan pa lta bu'o
T03D3787:20a-4: // stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'byung ba chen
T03D3787:20a-5: po bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi tshad shes par 'dod
T03D3787:20a-6: // pa dang ; de bzhin du sbyin pa 'di
T03D3787:20a-7: ltar byin pa ni 'bras bu chen por 'gyur ba
T03D3787:20a-8: // pa dang ; dang / sbyin pa 'di ltar
T03D3787:20a-9: byin pas ni rgyal rigs shing s'a la chen po
T03D3787:20a-10: lta bu la sogs par skye ba nas /
T03D3787:20a-11: de ltar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa 'di
T03D3787:20a-12: ltar byin na ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3787:20a-13: phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do zhes shes
T03D3787:20a-14: par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po zhes
T03D3787:20a-15: bya ba'i bar du gang gsungs pa ste /
T03D3787:20a-16: de ni gdul bya 'dun par byed pa'i ston par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3787:20a-17: de la s'a la chen po zhes bya ba ni
T03D3787:20a-18: mngon par mtshon par bya ba'i dbang phyug dang ldan
T03D3787:20a-19: pa'i phyir ro // bco lnga pa mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa ni rgyal po lta bu'o //
T03D3787:20a-20: sems bskyed pa gcig gis phyogs bcu re rer 'jig
T03D3787:20a-21: rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa las yang dag par
T03D3787:20a-23: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
T03D3787:20a-24: kyi chu'i phung po chen po de thams cad lan
T03D3787:20a-25: brgyar skra'i rtse mos thams cad gtor bar 'dod cing
T03D3787:20a-26: yang de na gnas pa'i srog chags rnams la mi
T03D3787:20a-28: bskal pa sreg pa'i me la kha'i dbugs gcig gis zhi bar bya bar 'dod pa dang /
T03D3787:20a-29: rnam par 'thor ba chen po'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor
T03D3787:20a-30: sor mo gcig gi rtse mos yongs su khebs par
T03D3787:20a-32: nam mkha'i khams ji tsam pa de thams cad skyi
T03D3787:20a-33: la mo krung gcig gis rgyas par yang dag par
T03D3787:20a-34: 'dod pa dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab la
T03D3787:20a-35: sogs pa'i ri rnams skra nyag ma gcig gis sbams
T03D3787:20a-36: te gyen du bteg nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal
T03D3787:20a-37: du med par 'phang bar 'dod pa dang /
T03D3787:20a-38: phyogs bcu re re'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
T03D3787:20a-39: kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lha'i mig gis lta
T03D3787:20b-0: de rnams las kyang chos bstan pa @20b lha'i rna bas mnyan par 'dod pa dang /
T03D3787:20b-1: sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes par 'dod pa dang /
T03D3787:20b-2: de rnams kyi 'ang sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par 'dod pa dang /
T03D3787:20b-3: zag pa zad pa shes pa'i mngon par shes pa
T03D3787:20b-4: sgrub par 'dod cing yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du
T03D3787:20b-5: me byed par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes
T03D3787:20b-6: gsungs pa ste / de ni mthu thogs pa med
T03D3787:20b-7: par gzhan gyi don sgrub pa yin pa'i phyir ro
T03D3787:20b-8: gsungs pa ste / // ri'i rgyal po ri rab
T03D3787:20b-9: la sogs pa skra nyag ma gcig gis bcings te
T03D3787:20b-10: 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas par 'phen pa la
T03D3787:20b-11: ni ma dad par mi bya ste /
T03D3787:20b-12: bsam gtan pa rnams kyi dbang 'byor pa ston pa
T03D3787:20b-13: 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos yin pa'i
T03D3787:20b-14: phyir ro // bcu drug pa bsod nams dang ye shes dang ldan pa ni bang mdzod lta bu'o //
T03D3787:20b-15: sangs rgyas tshad med pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
T03D3787:20b-16: dang bcas pa ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams
T03D3787:20b-17: cad bsod snyoms gcig gis khyed par bya bar 'dod
T03D3787:20b-18: pa dang / bden pa mthong ba rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nas /
T03D3787:20b-19: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
T03D3787:20b-20: chub kyi bar la 'jog par 'dod pa'i byang chub
T03D3787:20b-21: sems dpa' chen pos zhes gang gsungs pa yin te
T03D3787:20b-22: / de ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs
T03D3787:20b-23: mang po'i bang mdzod lta bu yin pa'i phyir ro
T03D3787:20b-24: / // bcu bdun pa byang chub kyi phyogs dang
T03D3787:20b-25: mthun pa'i chos dang ldan pa ni lam po che
T03D3787:20b-26: / // lta bu'o // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang /
T03D3787:20b-28: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad rjes su 'thob par 'dod pa dang /
T03D3787:20b-29: chos 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas rnams kyi pha
T03D3787:20b-30: rol tu phyin par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3787:20b-32: de ni 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad gshegs shing rjes su gshegs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3787:20b-33: bco brgyad pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dang ldan pa ni bzhon pa lta bu'o //
T03D3787:20b-34: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro bar 'dod pa dang /
T03D3787:21a-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad @21a * //
T03D3787:21a-1: kyi nang gi 'khor du 'gyur bar 'dong ba dang /
T03D3787:21a-2: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor 'thob par 'dod pa dang /
T03D3787:21a-3: yon tan rnam par sbyar bar 'dod pa dang /
T03D3787:21a-6: bsgom pa las byung ba'i bya ba dang /
T03D3787:21a-7: bkur sti dang rdzas las byung ba dang ldan pa'i
T03D3787:21a-8: bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po la sems can rnams
T03D3787:21a-9: dgod par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes gang
T03D3787:21a-11: de ni zung du 'jug pa yin pa'i phyir 'khor
T03D3787:21a-12: ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gang du 'ang
T03D3787:21a-13: mi ltung bas bde blag tu khyer bar byed pa'i
T03D3787:21a-14: phyir ro // de la nang gi 'khor zhes bya
T03D3787:21a-15: ba ni gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsang
T03D3787:21a-16: bar 'jug pa'i ye shes phra bar 'jug pa'i ye
T03D3787:21a-17: shes la rjes su zhugs par gyur pa'o //
T03D3787:21a-18: bcu dgu pa gzungs dang spobs pa dang ldan pa ni bkod ma'i chu lta bu'o //
T03D3787:21a-19: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa dang gsung bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste /
T03D3787:21a-20: mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang lung bstan pa nas /
T03D3787:21a-21: shin tu rgyas pa dang rmad du byung ba'i bar
T03D3787:21a-22: gang cung zad bstan pa de thams cad thos par
T03D3787:21a-23: 'dod pa dang / gzung bar 'dod pa dang /
T03D3787:21a-24: yongs su chub par bya bar 'dod pa dang /
T03D3787:21a-25: de bzhin nyid du sgrub par 'dod pa dang /
T03D3787:21a-26: gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3787:21a-27: de ni chu 'dzin pa dang mi zad par 'byin
T03D3787:21a-28: pa dang chos mthun par thos pa dang ma thos
T03D3787:21a-30: bstan pa mthar thug pa med pa 'byin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3787:21a-31: nyi shu pa chos kyi dga' ston dang ldan pa ni sgra snyan pa lta bu'o //
T03D3787:21a-32: phyogs bcu re re zhing 'jig rten gyi bar yun
T03D3787:21a-33: ring por mun pa mun nag tu gyur pa lus
T03D3787:21a-34: kyi 'od kyis snang bar byas nas der skyes pa'i
T03D3787:21a-35: sems can la sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /
T03D3787:21a-37: dge 'dun gyi sgra thos par bya bar 'dod pa dang /
T03D3787:21a-38: de dag yang dag pa'i lta ba la dgod par

T03D3787:21b-1: gdul bya rnams la snyan pa sgrogs pa yin pa'i
T03D3787:21b-2: yin te / phyir / chos kyi dga' ston yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
T03D3787:21b-3: 'du byed thams mi rtag par so sor rtog pa dang /
T03D3787:21b-4: zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad sdug bsngal bar so sor rtog pa dang /
T03D3787:21b-5: chos thams cad bdag med par so sor rtog pa dang /
T03D3787:21b-6: mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi bar so sor rtog pa'o //
T03D3787:21b-7: nyi shu gcig pa bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam dang ldan pa ni chu bo'i rgyun lta bu'o //
T03D3787:21b-8: phyogs bcu re re mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kyi sems can long ba dang /
T03D3787:21b-13: skom pa la sogs pa dang /
T03D3787:21b-14: ngan song du ltung ba rnams sdug bsngal de dang
T03D3787:21b-15: de las thar bar byas te mi'i lus 'thob bar

T03D3787:21b-21: la dgod par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes
T03D3787:21b-23: de ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas rang gi ngang gis 'jug pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3787:21b-24: bgrod pa gcig pa nyid ni sa der gtogs pa'i
T03D3787:21b-25: byang chub sems dpa' rnams gzhan gyi don gyi bya

T03D3787:21b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam bstan par 'dod pa dang /
T03D3787:21b-29: glang po che'i lta stangs kyis lta bar 'dod pa'i
T03D3787:21b-30: byang chub sems dpa' zhes rgya cher yang gsungs pa
T03D3787:21b-31: ste / dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa kun

T03D3787:21b-38: rnam par gang pa'i 'du shes dang /
T03D3787:21b-39: rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang /
T03D3787:22a-2: rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang /
T03D3787:22a-5: rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes so //
T03D3787:22a-6: de la 'tsho ba mthar thun pa'i 'og tu go
T03D3787:22a-7: rims bzhin du sbud pa rlung gis khengs pa ltar
T03D3787:22a-8: mtho bar skrangs shing rbobs [?] par gyur pa'i phyir
T03D3787:22a-10: rnam par bam pa nyid ni rnam par bam pa pa'o //

T03D3787:22a-12: bam bas na a'a by'a bhy'a ta ka zhes bye
T03D3787:22a-13: brag rtog byed du byung dhma ta k'a te rnam
T03D3787:22a-15: 'di ni de lta bu'i rang bzhin can ro'i lus kyi tshig bla dgas yin no //
T03D3787:22a-16: de bzhin du gzhan du yang bshad pa ni ming
T03D3787:22a-17: la stsogs pa'i don dag la brjod par bya ba
T03D3787:22a-18: yin no // de ni dbyibs la chags pa rnams
T03D3787:22a-19: la lus de'i dbyibs kyi rgyud pa ston pa'i phyir
T03D3787:22a-20: 'di bsgom par bya ba yin no //

T03D3787:22a-24: pa ste / de ni lus kyi mkhregs pa'i dngos
T03D3787:22a-25: po la chags pa la khong stong gi dngos po
T03D3787:22a-27: gnas tha dad pa nas rnag 'dzag pa ni rnam par gang pa pa ste /
T03D3787:22a-28: de ni phreng ba dang dri la sogs pa'i dbang
T03D3787:22a-29: las byung ba'i lus kyi dri la chags pa rnams
T03D3787:22a-30: la lus kyi rma dang 'brel pa'i dri nga ba
T03D3787:22a-32: 'di dang de nas khrag 'gred cing rnam par 'phro
T03D3787:22a-33: la rab tu 'dzag pas na rnam par dmar ba
T03D3787:22a-34: pa ste / de ni rgyan gyis byas pa'i mdzes
T03D3787:22a-35: pa la chags pa la khrag gis sbags pa'i mi
T03D3787:22a-36: mthun pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir yin no //
T03D3787:22a-37: rnam par gsal bar sdo bas na rnam par bsngos pa pa ste /
T03D3787:22a-38: de ni lus kyi kha dog la chags pa la
T03D3787:22a-39: pags pa'i 'dod chags kyi rgud pa bstan pa'i phyir
T03D3787:22a-40: yin no // khyi dang ce spyang la sogs pas
T03D3787:22a-41: phan tshun du rnam pa sna tshogs par zos pa
T03D3787:22a-42: ni rnam par zos pa pa ste /
T03D3787:22a-43: de ni nu ma la sogs pa'i sha rgyas pa
T03D3787:22a-44: la chags ba la sha rgyas pa rnam par bstan
T03D3787:22b-0: lag pa gnyis @22b kyang gzhan du /
T03D3787:22b-1: rkang pa gnyis kyang gzhan du /
T03D3787:22b-3: sna tshogs par 'thor bas na rnam par 'thor pa pa ste /
T03D3787:22b-4: de ni yan lag dang nying lag gi sgeg pa
T03D3787:22b-5: la chags pa la yan lag dang nying lag rnam
T03D3787:22b-6: par 'thor bar bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3787:22b-7: rus pa nyid ni rus pa pa ste /

T03D3787:22b-9: de ni so la sogs pa'i rus pa'i 'byor pa
T03D3787:22b-10: la chags pa la lus kyi rus pa'i mi mthun
T03D3787:22b-11: pa'i dngos po ston pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3787:22b-12: rnam par zhu zhing tshig par rnam par tshig pa pa ste /
T03D3787:22b-13: de ni kha dog dang dbyibs la chags pa la
T03D3787:22b-14: pags pa dang dbyibs kun du 'khums pa ston pa

T03D3787:22b-16: // skyes bu chen po'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad
T03D3787:22b-17: bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste
T03D3787:22b-18: // / chos 'di ni 'dod pa chung ba rnams kyi yin gyi /

T03D3787:22b-23: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /
T03D3787:22b-25: shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyi yin gyi /
T03D3787:22b-26: shes rab 'chal pa rnams kyi ni ma yin pa ste /
T03D3787:22b-27: skyes bu chen po'i rnam par rtog pa bdun po
T03D3787:22b-28: 'di dag gis gnas brtan mood gal gyi bu chen
T03D3787:22b-30: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mood gal gyi bu chen
T03D3787:22b-31: po khyod bu chen po'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad
T03D3787:22b-32: po 'di dag la yang rnam par rtogs shig /
T03D3787:22b-33: chos 'di ni spros pa med pa spros pa med
T03D3787:22b-35: spros pa med pa la kun dga' ba'i sbyor ba
T03D3787:22b-36: la rjes su brtson pa yin no zhes gsungs so
T03D3787:22b-37: // de la 'dod pa chung bas chos bzhi spong ste /

T03D3787:22b-44: bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pa sems
T03D3787:22b-45: ltos pa dang bcas pa dang 'brel pas dgon pa
T03D3787:23a-0: pa'am / phyag dar khrod pa'am stan gcig pa nas sbyangs pa'i yon tan @23a * //
T03D3787:23a-1: gzhan gang yang rung ba la nye bar bsten te gnas par gyur pa na /

T03D3787:23a-5: rjed par byed na ci ma rung bdag gis kyang rnyed pa dang /
T03D3787:23a-7: tshigs su bcad pa grub par bya na ci ma rung snyam du sems shing /

T03D3787:23a-26: rnyed pa don du gnyer zhing rnyed pa la sogs

T03D3787:23a-32: kha zhu 'brel par bcas pa dang /

T03D3787:23a-34: gzhogs slong zhes bya ba ni 'di na kha cig

T03D3787:23b-0: khyed kyi 'bras chan 'di @23b ni bzang po yin no //
T03D3787:23b-4: khyed kyi bca' bar bya ba'am /
T03D3787:23b-5: bza' bar bya ba 'di ni bzang po yin no //

T03D3787:23b-12: gzhogs slong gi las dngos po de dang de nyed
T03D3787:23b-13: kyi rgyu mtshan du brjod pa gang yin pa 'di
T03D3787:23b-15: nges par ston pa zhes bya ba ni 'di na

T03D3787:23b-22: nye du dang sang gi gnyen mtshams gang yang rung
T03D3787:23b-23: ba gzhan dag la yang sbyin par mi bya bar
T03D3787:23b-24: khyed kyis gang zhig la sbyin par bya ba 'am
T03D3787:23b-25: bya ba bsgrub pa yin zhes smra zhing /

T03D3787:23b-28: khyed dang dgra bcom pa lhan cig tu phrad pa
T03D3787:23b-29: dang / lhan cig tu 'dug pa dang /
T03D3787:23b-30: gtam smra bar 'gyur ba ni khyed rnyed pa dang ldan pa'o //
T03D3787:23b-31: khyed kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do //
T03D3787:23b-32: khyed kyis 'byor pa legs par thob bo //
T03D3787:23b-33: mir rnyed pa'ang don yod pa yin no zhes smra zhing /

T03D3787:23b-43: pa gang yin pa 'di ni nges par ston pa
T03D3787:24a-0: zhes bya'o // chog shes pa ni rnyed pas rnyed @24a * //

T03D3787:145b-0: de ni mngon par @145b rtogs pa dang ldan pa

T03D3787:163b-0: pa'i byang chub sems @163b dpas rnal 'byor gyi chos

T03D3787:163b-16: du gang gsungs pa yin no //

T03D3787:163b-33: bar byed pa'i bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs grub pas

T03D3787:163b-42: mi ldog pa'i bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs grub pas
T03D3787:164a-1: byin gyi brlabs kyis song ba na rang nyid mngon
T03D3787:164a-2: pa'i nga rgyal skyes pas byang chub sems dpa' gzhan
T03D3787:164a-3: la brnyas par byed pa de'i mtshan nyid yin pa

T03D3787:164a-24: bshes gnyen rnams la brten par bya ba nyid dang
T03D3787:164a-25: / de rnams dge ba'i chos thob par byed lam

T03D3787:164a-28: byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa'i dge ba'i bshes
T03D3787:164a-29: gnyen yin pa nyid du gang gsungs pa yin no

T03D3787:164a-34: zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //

T03D3787:164b-15: / da ni de'i rnam par 'phel ba gang zhig yin zhe na /

T03D3787:165a-0: rol tu phyin pa la gcig tu @165a * //

T03D3787:165a-46: ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa bkag pas

T03D3787:165b-26: kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
T03D3787:165b-27: drung du bdud sdig can tho 'tshams pa'i bsam pas
T03D3787:165b-29: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /

T03D3787:166a-0: lung ma bstan pa lung bstan pa la gnod par sems pa dang ldan pa la @166a * //

T03D3787:166a-3: na de snyed kyi bskal par dmyal bar gnas par

T03D3787:166a-31: mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa gang yin pa 'thad

T03D3787:166a-37: par shes par byed pa'i don gyis gang gsungs pa

T03D3787:166a-41: dpes rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa'i 'bras bu sangs
T03D3787:166a-42: rgyas nyid thob pa rnyed pa ni ches nyung ba

T03D3787:200a-12: sangs rgyas rnams ni byung gyur kyang //
T03D3787:200a-13: skal ba med pas bzang mi myong //
T03D3787:200a-15: de ltar mdzad pa rgya che'i phyir //
T03D3787:200a-16: sangs rgyas khyab par nges par brjod //
T03D3787:200a-17: de nyid zad pa med pa'i phyir //
T03D3787:200a-18: rtag pa zhes kyang brjod pa yin //
T03D3787:200a-19: de ltar na dgos pa 'dis sangs rgyas thams cad du song ba dang /
T03D3787:200a-20: rtag pa yin par bshad pas bstan bcos dang 'gal ba med do //
T03D3787:200a-21: ngo bo nyid kyi sku bshad zin to /
T03D3787:200a-23: // / da ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku brjod par bya ba yin te /
T03D3787:200a-25: mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dang //
T03D3787:200a-26: dpe byad brgyad cu'i bdag nyid 'di //
T03D3787:200a-27: theg chen nye bar longs spyod phyir //
T03D3787:200a-28: thub pa'i longs spyod rdzogs skur bzhed//
T03D3787:200a-30: sku des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
T03D3787:200a-31: dpa' chen po sa chen po la zhugs pa rnams
T03D3787:200a-32: dang thabs cig tu kha na ma thob med pa
T03D3787:200a-33: theg pa chen po'i chos kyi longs spyod kyi dga'
T03D3787:200a-34: ba dang bde ba so sor myong bar mdzad pa
T03D3787:200a-35: yin no // skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang gnag zhe na /
T03D3787:200a-36: phyag zhabs 'khor los mtshan dang rus sbal zhabs //
T03D3787:200a-37: phyag dang zhabs sor dra bas 'brel pa dang //
T03D3787:200a-38: phyag ni zhabs bcas 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags //
T03D3787:200a-39: 'di yi sku ni bdun dag mtho ba dang //
T03D3787:200a-40: sor mo ring dang rting yangs sku che drang //
T03D3787:200a-41: zhabs 'bur mi mngon spu ni gyen na du phyogs //
T03D3787:200a-42: byin pa ae ya 'dra phyag ring mdzes //
T03D3787:200a-43: mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa'i mchog /'phags pa gser mdog pags pa srab pa dang //
T03D3787:200a-44: sbun re re nas g-yas legs 'khrungs dang //
T03D3787:200a-45: zhal mdzod spus brgyan ro stod seng ge 'dra /
T03D3787:200b-0: @200b 'di yi dpung pa'i mgo zlum phrag pa rgyas //
T03D3787:200b-1: 'di la ro mi zhim pa 'ang ro mchog snang //
T03D3787:200b-2: sku ni nya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab //
T03D3787:200b-3: gtsug tor dbur ldan ljags ring mdzes pa dang //
T03D3787:200b-4: tshangs dbyangs 'gram pa seng ge'i 'dra dang tshems //
T03D3787:200b-5: shin tu dkar dang tshems mnyam thags bzang dang //
T03D3787:200b-6: grangs ni bzhi bcu tham pa tshang pa dang //
T03D3787:200b-7: spyan ni mthon mthing spyan rdzi ba mchog gi /'dra ba 'di dag sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan //
T03D3787:200b-9: de la phyag zhabs 'khor los mtshan dang zhes bya
T03D3787:200b-10: ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi
T03D3787:200b-11: mthil rnams la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa
T03D3787:200b-12: mu khyud dang lte ba dang bcas pa rnam pa
T03D3787:200b-13: thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa 'di lta ste dper
T03D3787:200b-14: na rus pa'am ba so la gzugs su brkos pa
T03D3787:200b-15: dang 'dra ba mnga' ba yin no //
T03D3787:200b-16: zhabs kyi mthil gnyis mnyam par sa la 'jog cing
T03D3787:200b-17: zhabs rnyongs pa med pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa
T03D3787:200b-18: dang / dad pa'i rgyal pho ltar phyag dang zhabs
T03D3787:200b-19: kyi sor mo dra bas 'brel pas phyag dang zhabs
T03D3787:200b-21: phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil shing bal gyi 'dab ma
T03D3787:200b-22: ltar shin tu 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pas phyag
T03D3787:200b-23: dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang /
T03D3787:200b-24: phyag dang zhabs dang phrag pa gnyis dang ltag pa'i phyogs mtho bas bdun mtho ba dang /
T03D3787:200b-25: phyag dang zhabs kyi ser mo ring bas sor mo ring ba dang /
T03D3787:200b-26: rting pa ring bas rting pa yangs pa dang /
T03D3787:200b-27: sku khru bdun tsam du 'phags shing ya yo med pas sku che zhing drang ba nyid dang /
T03D3787:200b-28: pus mo'i lhang dang long bu mdzes par nub pas zhabs 'bar 'bur mi mngon pa dang /
T03D3787:200b-29: ba spu gyen du g-yas phyogs su 'khyil pas sku'i spu gyen du phyogs pa dang /
T03D3787:200b-30: byin pa ri dags sha ra bha dang /
T03D3787:200b-31: ae ne ya lta bu yin pa'i phyir yongs su
T03D3787:200b-32: ma nyams shing rim par 'tsham la rgyas shing zlum
T03D3787:200b-33: pas byin pa ri dags ae ne ya'i lta bu
T03D3787:200b-34: dang / zhabs dang phyag mnyam pa'i phyir ma btud
T03D3787:200b-35: par phyag gi mthil gnyis kyis pus mo'i lha nga
T03D3787:200b-36: la slebs pas phyag ring zhing mdzes pa nyid dang
T03D3787:200b-37: dang / / glang po dang rta cang shes ltar
T03D3787:200b-38: gsang ba'i mtshan ma shin tu mdzes par sbubs su
T03D3787:200b-39: nub pas mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa
T03D3787:201a-1: shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu
T03D3787:201a-2: dang ldan pas gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba nyid
T03D3787:201a-3: dang / dngul dang gser sa le sbram legs par
T03D3787:201a-4: yongs su sbyangs pa dang 'dra bar pags pa shin
T03D3787:201a-5: tu 'jam zhing snyoms pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3787:201a-6: sku la rdul gyis ma gos pas pags pa 'jam pa nyid dang /
T03D3787:201a-7: ba spu shin tu rnam par phye zhing re re
T03D3787:201a-8: nas gnyis pa med par skyes pas ba sbu re
T03D3787:201a-10: 'di'i zhal gyi smin ma'i bar kun da dang ba'i
T03D3787:201a-11: 'o ma dang kha ba ltar dkar zhing zla ba
T03D3787:201a-12: dang nyi ma bas lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa'i
T03D3787:201a-13: spus brgyan pas zhal mdzod spus mtshan pa nyid de
T03D3787:201a-14: / mdzod spu zhes bya ba ni spu dkar zhing 'jam pas g-yas su 'khyil bar gnas pa'o //
T03D3787:201a-15: sku'i stod 'phel ka che bas ro stod seng ge 'dra ba nyid dang /
T03D3787:201a-16: mgrin pa legs par 'brel zhing kun nas zlum pas dpung mgo shin du zlum pa nyid dang /
T03D3787:201a-17: gser gyi glegs ma shin tu phyis pa ltar thong
T03D3787:201a-18: ka rgyas pas phrag pa'i bar rgyas pa nyid dang
T03D3787:201a-19: / ljags rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyis
T03D3787:201a-20: ma nyams pa'i phyir dang ro bro ba so sor
T03D3787:201a-21: myong ba dang mthun pa'i rnam par shes pa mnga'
T03D3787:201a-22: bas ro bro ba mkhyen pa nyid dang /
T03D3787:201a-23: sku'i khyon dang 'dom gyi tshad du mnyam bas n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab pa nyid dang /
T03D3787:201a-24: dbu'i gtsug tor zlum zhing kun nas mnyam pas g-yas
T03D3787:201a-25: su 'khyil ba dang ldan zhing dbu mnyam pa la
T03D3787:201a-26: legs par rgyas shing lta na sdug pa'i gtsug tor
T03D3787:201a-27: dang ldan pas dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa nyid
T03D3787:201a-28: dang / autpala dmar po'i 'dab ma'i mdog 'dra zhing yangs pas ljags ring zhing srab pa nyid dang /
T03D3787:201a-30: bya ka la ping ka'i lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs nyid dang /
T03D3787:201a-31: 'gram pa me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar legs par
T03D3787:201a-32: grub cing zlum la rgyas shing lta na sdug pas
T03D3787:201a-33: 'gram pa seng ge lta bu nyid dang /
T03D3787:201a-34: kun da dang dung bcag 'phro ltar shin tu dkar ba'i tshems mnga' bas tshems dkar ba nyid dang /
T03D3787:201a-35: tshems la mthon dman med pas tshems mnyam pa nyid dang /
T03D3787:201a-36: tshems la mtshams ma dod pas tshems thags bzang ba nyid dang /
T03D3787:201a-37: tshems bla 'og lhag chad med pas tshems bzhi bcu mnyam pa nyid dang /
T03D3787:201b-0: dkar nag @201b gi cha ma 'dres shing shin tu
T03D3787:201b-1: rnam par dag pa'i phyir dang dmar po ra ri
T03D3787:201b-2: dang ma 'brel bas spyan mthon mthing nyid dang /
T03D3787:201b-3: 'og na gnas pa dang steng na gnas pa'i rdzi
T03D3787:201b-4: ma rnams legs par gzhol ba'i phyir dang ma 'dres
T03D3787:201b-5: pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzi ma ba'i rdzi ma
T03D3787:201b-7: 'di la mchan ni gang gang gi //
T03D3787:201b-8: sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu gang yin //
T03D3787:201b-9: de dang de ni rab rdzogs pas //
T03D3787:201b-11: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid 'di rnams kyang
T03D3787:201b-12: sngon gyi yongs su sbyong ba yongs su rdzogs pa'i
T03D3787:201b-13: mtshan nyid las grub par rig par bya'o //
T03D3787:201b-14: yang mtshan gang gi sngon gyi yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyu gang zhe na /
T03D3787:201b-15: bla ma skyel la sogs pa dang //
T03D3787:201b-16: yang dag blang ba brtan pa dang //
T03D3787:201b-17: bsdu ba bsten dang gya nom pa'i //
T03D3787:201b-18: dngos po sbyin dang gsad bya ba //
T03D3787:201b-19: thar bar byed dang dge ba ni //
T03D3787:201b-20: yang dag blangs pa spel la sogs //
T03D3787:201b-21: sgrub byed rgyu yi mtshan nyid dang ;
T03D3787:201b-22: / mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin //
T03D3787:201b-25: bla ma rnams la bsu ba dang /
T03D3787:201b-28: me tog gi phreng ba 'bul ba dang /
T03D3787:201b-29: gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten la sogs pa'i gan du 'gro ba dang /
T03D3787:201b-30: g-yog 'khor byin pas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa yin te /
T03D3787:201b-31: de ni 'khor shin tu mang ba'i snga ltas so //
T03D3787:201b-32: yi dam la shin tu brtan pas na zhabs shin tu gnas pa ste /
T03D3787:201b-33: de ni gang gis rang gi rtogs pa'i chos la
T03D3787:201b-34: gzhan gyis g-yo bar mi nus pa mi g-yo ba'i
T03D3787:201b-35: snga ltas so // bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi bsten
T03D3787:201b-36: pas na phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas
T03D3787:201b-37: snga ltas so // 'brel pa ste / de ni
T03D3787:201b-38: gang gis ma bsdus pa'i sems can rnams sdud par
T03D3787:201b-39: byed pa myur du sdud pa'i snga ltas so //
T03D3787:201b-40: bza' ba dang btung ba dang /
T03D3787:201b-41: bldag pa dang bca' ba bya nom pa rnams byin
T03D3787:201b-42: pas na phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags
T03D3787:201b-43: pa dang / bdun mtho ba ste /
T03D3787:201b-44: de gnyis ni bza' ba dang /
T03D3787:201b-47: bca' ba gya nom pa 'thob pa'i snga ltas so //
T03D3787:201b-48: bcings pa thar bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
T03D3787:202a-0: srog gcod pa las slar ldog @202a * //
T03D3787:202a-1: pa bsten pas na sor mo ring ba dang rting
T03D3787:202a-2: pa yangs pa dang sku che zhing drang ba ste
T03D3787:202a-3: / de ni tshe ring ba'i snga ltas so //
T03D3787:202a-4: dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs shing gzung ba yang dag par spel ba'i phyir dang /
T03D3787:202a-5: nyams par ma byas pa na zhabs kyi 'bar 'bur mi mngon pa nyid dang //
T03D3787:202a-6: sku'i spu gyen du phyogs pa ste /
T03D3787:202a-7: de ni yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos nyid dam gdul bya'i snga ltas te /
T03D3787:202a-8: 'dir gdul bya ni yang dag par bsdus pa'i sems
T03D3787:202a-9: can gyi khams gang yin pa yongs su smin pa'o
T03D3787:202a-10: // gus par byas te rigs dang bzo'i las rnams nye bar byin pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3787:202a-11: lhvam byin pas na byin pa ae ne ya'i lta bu ste /
T03D3787:202a-12: de ni gang gis bshad par bya ba dang dgongs
T03D3787:202a-13: pa drangs zin pa'i don 'dzin par byed pa myur
T03D3787:202a-15: rang la bdog pa'i nor slangs na ster ba dang /
T03D3787:202a-16: med ces mi spyod pa'i phyir phyag ring zhing mdzes pa ste /
T03D3787:202a-17: phyag drang zhing ring ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03D3787:202a-18: de la drang ba nyid ni bdog pa'i nor slangs
T03D3787:202a-19: pa mi sbed pa'i gya gyu med pa las yin
T03D3787:202a-20: la / rang nyid ni slong mo pa ma spangs shing skabs phye ba las so //
T03D3787:202a-21: de ni dbang du gyur pa dang 'dul ba'i snga ltas te /
T03D3787:202a-22: sems dbang du gyur pas ser sna'i gzhan gyi dbang du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir dang /
T03D3787:202a-23: nyon mongs pa 'dul bas thams cad kyi tshe mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang ma 'brel ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3787:202a-25: rang gi skye bo dang 'brel pa dang /
T03D3787:202a-26: lhan cig 'grogs pa rnams phan tshun mi 'byed pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3787:202a-27: sems can bye ba rnams bsdums pa'i phyir dang ;
T03D3787:202a-28: tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3787:202a-29: gsang ba'i gros bsrungs pa'i phyir mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa ste /
T03D3787:202a-30: de ni 'khor ba ji srid par sangs rgyas kyi
T03D3787:202a-31: gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir sras mang ba'i snga
T03D3787:202a-37: gnas khang gya nom pa rnams byin pas na mdog gser 'dra ba dang pags pa 'jam pas te /
T03D3787:202a-38: de gnyis ni gding ba dang /
T03D3787:202b-0: gnas khang gya nom pa rnams @202b rnyed pa'i snga ltas so //
T03D3787:202b-8: bla ma rnams ji lta ba bzhin rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su bkod pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3787:202b-9: de la bsnyen bkur byed pa'i rim gro pa byin
T03D3787:202b-10: pas na ba spu re re nas g-yas phyogs su
T03D3787:202b-11: 'khyil ba dang zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa ste /
T03D3787:202b-12: de ni do zla med pa'i snga ltas so //
T03D3787:202b-13: mu cor mi smra ba dang /
T03D3787:202b-14: gzhan la mi smod pa dang /
T03D3787:202b-16: legs par bshad pa la rjes su mthun par byed pas na ro stod seng ge lta bu dang /
T03D3787:202b-17: dpung mgo legs par zlum pa ste /
T03D3787:202b-18: de ni thogs pa med pa'i snga ltas te /
T03D3787:202b-19: ye shes dang mthu thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3787:202b-20: nad pa rnams la sman dang rim gro pa dang
T03D3787:202b-21: sman pa dang phan pa'i zas byin pa dang rim
T03D3787:202b-22: gro byas pas na phrag pa'i bar rgyas pa ste
T03D3787:202b-23: / 'di'i phrag pa gnyis kyi bar rnams shin tu rgyas pa'o //
T03D3787:202b-24: ro bro ba mkhyen pa zhes bya ba ni bcom
T03D3787:202b-25: ldan 'das kyi rnam par smin pas thob pa nyid
T03D3787:202b-26: kyis ljags kyi dbang po 'di 'dra bar gyur pa
T03D3787:202b-27: yin te / dbang po dang ro ngan pa phrad
T03D3787:202b-28: du zin kyang de ro bro ba mchog nyid du
T03D3787:202b-29: yang dag par myong bar mdzad pa ste /
T03D3787:202b-30: de ni gnod pa nyung ba'i snga ltas so ;
T03D3787:202b-35: bgrod dka' bar zam pa btags pa dang /
T03D3787:202b-39: 'dug gnas byed pa la sogs pa la thog mar
T03D3787:202b-40: 'gro zhing gzhan dag kyang spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir
T03D3787:202b-41: dang / snga ma rnams las lhag par byed pa'i
T03D3787:202b-42: phyir phyag gnyis brkyang ba'i zheng gi cha ji tsam
T03D3787:202b-43: yin pa 'og gi zhabs nas brtsams te spyi bo'i
T03D3787:202b-44: bar gyi khyon de srid yin pas na n+ya gro
T03D3787:202b-45: dha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang dbu gtsug tor
T03D3787:202b-47: de ni mnga' brnyes pa'i snga ltas so //
T03D3787:202b-48: yun ring po nas 'jam zhing snyan la mnyen pa'i tshig brjod pas na /
T03D3787:202b-49: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
T03D3787:202b-50: ji tsam bzhed pa'i bar du ljags kyis khebs par
T03D3787:202b-52: ngag gcig brjod pa rnam par rig pa du ma'i rgyu mtshan yin pa'i phyir ljags ring ba dang /
T03D3787:203a-1: khams mang pos bar du chod pa dang /
T03D3787:203a-2: gam la gnas pa'i gdul bya rnams kyi rna ba'i
T03D3787:203a-3: dbang po'i yul du mtshungs par gyur pa'i gsung dbyangs
T03D3787:203a-4: mnga' ba'i phyir tshangs pa'i dbyangs te /
T03D3787:203a-5: de rnams ni ngag gi lam yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs thob pa'i snga ltas te /
T03D3787:203a-6: ngag gi lam yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs ni /
T03D3787:203a-7: kun shes par bya zhing rnam par shes par bya ba dang /
T03D3787:203a-8: mnyan par 'os shing mi mthun pa med pa dang /
T03D3787:203a-9: zab cing rjes su sgrogs pa dang /
T03D3787:203a-10: mi tshugs shing rnar snyan pa dang /
T03D3787:203a-11: rig cing khyab par byed pa'o //
T03D3787:203a-12: rig cing zhes bya ba ni rtogs par byed pa zhes brjod pa yin te /
T03D3787:203a-13: de nyid kyis na khyab par byed pa zhes gsungs te /
T03D3787:203a-14: gdul bya'i skye bo sna tshogs kyi rgyud rtogs par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3787:203a-15: yun ring por tshig rkyal pa las log pa dang /
T03D3787:203a-16: dus su smra bas na 'gram pa seng ge 'dra ba ste /
T03D3787:203a-17: de ni ngag btsun pa'i snga ltas so //
T03D3787:203a-20: 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas na tshems shin tu dkar ba tshems mnyam pa ste /
T03D3787:203a-21: de ni 'khor snga nas bsags pa'i snga ltas so //
T03D3787:203a-22: yun ring po nas bden zhing phra ma med pa'i
T03D3787:203a-23: tshig kun tu spyad pas na tshems thags bzang ba
T03D3787:203a-24: dang bzhi bcu mnga' bas te /
T03D3787:203a-25: de ni 'khor mi phyed pa'i snga ltas so //
T03D3787:203a-26: 'khyud par byed pa dang smod par byed pa la
T03D3787:203a-27: yang chags pa dang sdang ba med cing rmongs pa
T03D3787:203a-28: med pa'i spyan gyis gzigs pas na spyan mthon mthing
T03D3787:203a-29: dang rdzi ma ba'i lta bu ste /
T03D3787:203a-30: de ni kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas te /
T03D3787:203a-31: spyan phye ba'i rang bzhin can dang chos mtshungs so //
T03D3787:203a-32: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bshad zin to /
T03D3787:203a-34: // / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rnams brjod par bya ba yin te /
T03D3787:203a-35: des na gsungs pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
T03D3787:203a-36: rnams ni 'du byed thams cad la chags pa dang
T03D3787:203a-37: bral bas na sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu
T03D3787:203a-38: dang // rang gi skye bo bzhin du sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
T03D3787:203a-39: bde bar dgongs pa'i thugs mnga' bas na sen mo snum pa dang /
T03D3787:203a-40: rigs dang rgyud mthon por bltams pas na sen mo mtho ba dang /
T03D3787:203a-41: tshul kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' bas na sor mo rnams zlum pa dang /
T03D3787:203b-0: @203b dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po bsags pas na /
T03D3787:203b-1: sor mo rnams rgyas pa dang /
T03D3787:203b-2: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rim gyis yang dag par bsags pas na /
T03D3787:203b-3: sor mo rnams rim gyis phra ba dang /
T03D3787:203b-6: thugs kyi phrin las kyi mtha' dang /
T03D3787:203b-7: 'tsho ba dag pa sbas pas rtsa mi mngon pa dang /
T03D3787:203b-8: nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa grol bar mdzad pas na /
T03D3787:203b-9: rtsa la mdud pa med pa dang /
T03D3787:203b-10: shin tu legs par sbas pa'i chos nyid can yin pas na /
T03D3787:203b-11: long bu mi mngon pa dang /
T03D3787:203b-12: nyam nga ba thams cad las nges par sgrol bar mdzad pas na /
T03D3787:203b-13: zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa dang /
T03D3787:203b-14: mi'i seng ge yin pas na /
T03D3787:203b-15: seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa dang /
T03D3787:203b-16: mi'i glang po che yin pas na glang po'i sta bas su gshegs pa dang /
T03D3787:203b-17: ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la gshegs pas na ngang pa'i stabs su gshegs pa dang /
T03D3787:203b-18: skyes bu'i khyu mchog yin pas na khyu mchog gi stabs su gshegs pa dang /
T03D3787:203b-19: mthun pa'i lam mnga' bas na g-yas phyogs su gshegs pa dang /
T03D3787:203b-20: blta na mdzes pas na mdzes par gshegs pa dang /
T03D3787:203b-21: rtag tu thugs gya gyu mi mnga' bas na sku drang ba dang /
T03D3787:203b-22: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i yon tan ston par mdzad pas na sku 'khril bag chags pa dang /
T03D3787:203b-23: sdig pa'i chos rnams shin tu sbyangs pas na sku byi dor byas pa lta bu dang /
T03D3787:203b-24: chos rim gyis ston par mdzad pas na sku rim par 'tsham pa dang /
T03D3787:203b-25: sku dang gsung dang thugs gtsang ba dang ldan pas na sku gtsang ba dang /
T03D3787:203b-26: rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam bas na sku 'jam pa dang /
T03D3787:203b-27: rang bzhin gyis thugs rnam par dag pas na sku rnam par dag pa dang /
T03D3787:203b-28: chos 'dul ba legs par yongs su rdzogs pas na mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T03D3787:203b-29: yangs shing mdzes pa'i yon tan brjod par mdzad pas na sku'i kho lag yangs shing bzang ba dang /
T03D3787:203b-30: thams cad la thugs snyoms pas na gom pa snyoms pa dang /
T03D3787:203b-31: gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pas na spyan rnam par dag pa dang /
T03D3787:203b-32: shin tu 'jam pas chos ston par mdzad pas na sku shin tu gzhon sha can dang /
T03D3787:203b-33: rtag tu zhum pa med pa'i thugs mnga' bas na sku zhum pa med pa dang /
T03D3787:204a-1: ba rnams bcom pas na sku rgyas pa dang /
T03D3787:204a-2: yang srid pa dang rjes su 'brel pa zad pas na sku shin tu grims pa dang /
T03D3787:204a-3: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag dang nyid
T03D3787:204a-4: lag legs par ston par mdzad pas na yan lag
T03D3787:204a-5: dang nyid lag shin tu rnam par 'byes pa dang
T03D3787:204a-6: / gzigs pa rnam par dag pas na gzigs pa rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa dang /
T03D3787:204a-7: tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa'i slob ma mnga' bas na dku zlum pa dang /
T03D3787:204a-8: 'khor ba'i skyon rab tu sbyangs pas na dku skabs phyin pa dang /
T03D3787:204a-9: nga rgyal gyi dreg pa bcom pas na dku ma rnyongs pa dang /
T03D3787:204a-10: chos zad pa rnam par bzlog par mdzad pas na phyal phyang nge ba dang /
T03D3787:204a-11: chos zab mo mngon du mdzad pas na lte ba zab pa dang /
T03D3787:204a-12: mthun par 'dzin pa'i slob ma mnga' bas na lte ba g-yas su 'khyil ba dang /
T03D3787:204a-13: kun nas mdzes pa'i slob ma'i tshogs mnga' bas na kun nas mdzes pa dang /
T03D3787:204a-14: thugs mchog tu gtsang bas na kun du spyod pa gtsang ba dang /
T03D3787:204a-15: chos 'dul ba nag po ston pa dang bral bas
T03D3787:204a-16: na sku la sme ba dang gnag bag med pa
T03D3787:204a-17: dang / shing bal dang 'dra bar yang ba'i lus
T03D3787:204a-18: thob par byed pa'i chos ston par mdzad pas na
T03D3787:204a-19: phyag shing bal ltar 'jam pa dang /
T03D3787:204a-20: rang gi skye bo dang skye bo phal po che
T03D3787:204a-21: la snyoms par byas pas dge sbyong chen po brnyes
T03D3787:204a-22: pas na phyag gi ri mo mdangs yod pa dang
T03D3787:204a-23: / mchog tu zab cing brtan par gnas pas na phyag gi ri mo zab pa dang /
T03D3787:204a-24: rgya chen po la bzod pa'i chos ston par mdzad pas na phyag gi ri mo ring ba dang /
T03D3787:204a-25: shin tu rlabs po che ma yin pa'i bslab pa'i
T03D3787:204a-26: gzhi 'cha' bar mdzad pas na zhal ha cang mi
T03D3787:204a-27: ring ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad gzugs brnyan
T03D3787:204a-28: dang 'dra bar ston pas na zhal la gzugs kyi
T03D3787:204a-30: 'jam pa sngon du btang nas 'dul bas na ljags mnyen pa dang /
T03D3787:204a-31: yon tan phra mo'i tshogs dang ldan pas na ljags srab pa dang /
T03D3787:204a-32: byis pa'i skye bo chags pa can rnams gting dpag
T03D3787:204a-33: dka' ba'i chos kyis 'dul bas na ljags dmar ba
T03D3787:204a-34: dang / glang po che'i nga ro dang /
T03D3787:204a-35: 'brug gi sgra rnams la bsnyems pa mi mnga' bas
T03D3787:204b-0: glang po che dang 'brug gi @204b sgra dbyangs dang
T03D3787:204b-1: ldan pa dang / snyan zhing mnyen la 'jam pas
T03D3787:204b-2: smra ba'i slob ma mnga' bas na gsung snyan zhing
T03D3787:204b-4: srid pa kun tu sbyor ba bsdams pas na mche ba zlum pa dang /
T03D3787:204b-5: skye bo rnon pos 'dul ba la mkhas pas na mche ba rno ba dang /
T03D3787:204b-6: chos 'dul ba mchog tu dkar bas na mche ba dkar ba dang /
T03D3787:204b-7: sa'i cha mnyam pa la zhugs pas na mche ba mnyam pa dang /
T03D3787:204b-8: mngon par rtogs pa rim gyis ston par mdzad pas na mche ba byin gyis phra ba dang /
T03D3787:204b-9: shes rab kyi ri bo mthon po la bzhugs pas na shangs mtho ba dang /
T03D3787:204b-10: gdul bya'i skye bo gtsang ma yid ches bas na shangs gtsang ba dang /
T03D3787:204b-11: sangs rgyas kyi chos mchog tu yangs pa dang ldan pas na spyan yangs pa dang /
T03D3787:204b-12: sems can gyi tshogs bsags pas na rdzi ma stug pa dang /
T03D3787:204b-13: lha dang lha ma yin dang mi'i na chung ltar
T03D3787:204b-14: mig dkar nag 'byes shing padma'i 'dab ma rangs pa
T03D3787:204b-15: lta bu dang ldan pas mchog rnams kyis mngon par
T03D3787:204b-16: bstod pas na spyan dkar nag 'byes shing padma'i 'dab
T03D3787:204b-17: ma rangs pa lta bu dang /
T03D3787:204b-18: rtag tu yangs pa ston pas na smin tshugs ring ba dang /
T03D3787:204b-19: 'jam pos 'dul ba la mkhas pas na smin ma 'jam pa dang /
T03D3787:204b-20: skyon kun nas mkhyen pas na smin ma'i spu mnyam pa dang /
T03D3787:204b-21: dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar snum pas rgyud snum
T03D3787:204b-22: par gyur pa'i skye bo rnams 'dul bas na smin
T03D3787:204b-24: mchog tu rgyas shing ring ba'i phyag mnga' bas na phyag rgyas shing ring ba dang /
T03D3787:204b-25: nyon mongs pa'i g-yul las rnam par rgyal bas na snyan mnyam pa dang /
T03D3787:204b-26: ma nyams pa'i sems can gyi rgyud 'dul bar mdzad
T03D3787:204b-27: pas na snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams pa dang
T03D3787:204b-28: / blta bar bya ba thams cad rnam par spang pas na dpral ba legs par 'byes pa dang /
T03D3787:204b-29: dge sbyong dang bram ze dang phas kyi rgol ba
T03D3787:204b-30: rnams rab tu bcom pas na dpral ba'i dbyes che
T03D3787:204b-31: ba dang / smon lam gyi mchog tu yongs su
T03D3787:204b-32: rdzogs pas na yan lag gi mchog shin tu rgyas
T03D3787:204b-33: ba dang / pa dang / yul gyi bung ba'i
T03D3787:204b-34: dga' ba rnam par bzlog pas na dbu skra bung
T03D3787:204b-36: mthong ba dang sgom pas spang bar bya ba'i bag
T03D3787:204b-37: la nyal spangs pas na dbu skra stug pa dang
T03D3787:205a-0: / blo 'jam pos bstan pa'i snying po mngon par mkhyen pas na dbu skra @205a * //
T03D3787:205a-2: rtag tu ma 'khrugs pa'i thugs mnga' bas na dbu skra ma 'dzings pa dang /
T03D3787:205a-3: rtag tu ma brlang ba'i gsung mnga' bas na dbu skra mi bshor ba dang /
T03D3787:205a-4: byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog dri zhim
T03D3787:205a-5: pos skye bo rnams mthun par bsgrubs pas na dbu
T03D3787:205a-7: phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil dpal be'u dang bkra shis dang g-yung drung 'khyil bas brgyan pa yin no //
T03D3787:205a-8: mdo'i tshig lhug pa bsdu bar bya ba'i don du
T03D3787:205a-9: tshig le'ur byas pa tshigs su bcad pa 'di yin
T03D3787:205a-10: te / thub pa'i sen mo zangs mdog dang //
T03D3787:205a-11: mdog snum mtho dang sor mo rnams //
T03D3787:205a-12: zlum rgyas byin gyis phra ba dang //
T03D3787:205a-13: rtsa mi mngon pa mdud pa med //
T03D3787:205a-14: long bu mi mngon zhabs mnyam dang //
T03D3787:205a-15: seng ge glang chen bya dang ni //
T03D3787:205a-16: khyu mchog stabs gshegs g-yas phyogs dang //
T03D3787:205a-17: mdzes gshegs drang dang 'khril bag chags //
T03D3787:205a-19: gtsang dang 'jam dang dag pa'i sku //
T03D3787:205a-20: mtshan ni yongs su rdzogs pa dang //
T03D3787:205a-21: sku yi kho lag yangs shing bzang //
T03D3787:205a-22: gom snyoms pa dang spyan gnyis ni //
T03D3787:205a-23: dag dang gzhon sha can nyid dang //
T03D3787:205a-24: sku zhum med dang rgyas pa dang //
T03D3787:205a-25: shin tu grims pa'i sku nyid dang //
T03D3787:205a-26: yan lag shin tu rnam 'byes dang //
T03D3787:205a-27: gzigs pa sgrib med dag pa dang //
T03D3787:205a-28: dku zlum skabs phyin ma rnyongs dang //
T03D3787:205a-29: byang de ba dang lte ba ni //
T03D3787:205a-30: zab dang g-yas phyogs 'khyil ba dang //
T03D3787:205a-31: kun nas lta na sdug pa dang //
T03D3787:205a-32: kun spyod gtsang dang sku la ni //
T03D3787:205a-33: sme ba gnag bag med pa dang //
T03D3787:205a-34: phyag ni shing bal ltar 'jam dang //
T03D3787:205a-35: phyag ris mdangs yod zab ring dang //
T03D3787:205a-36: zhal ni ha cang mi ring dang //
T03D3787:205a-37: mchu ni bim pa ltar dmar dang //
T03D3787:205a-38: ljags mnyen pa dang srab pa dang //
T03D3787:205a-39: dmar dang 'brug gi sgra nyid dang //
T03D3787:205a-40: gsung mnyen 'jam dang mche ba zlum ;
T03D3787:205a-41: / rno dang dkar dang mnyam pa dang //
T03D3787:205a-42: byin gyis phra dang shangs mtho dang //
T03D3787:205a-43: mchog tu gtsang ba nyid dang ni //
T03D3787:205a-44: spyan yangs pa dang rdzi ma stug / padma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba dang //
T03D3787:205a-45: smin tshugs ring dang 'jam pa dang //
T03D3787:205a-46: snum dang spu ni mnyam pa dang //
T03D3787:205b-0: phyag ring rgyas dang snyan @205b mnyam dang //
T03D3787:205b-1: nyams pa rnam par spangs pa dang //
T03D3787:205b-2: dpral ba legs par 'byes pa dang //
T03D3787:205b-3: dbyes che ba dang dbu rgyas dang //
T03D3787:205b-4: dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag dang //
T03D3787:205b-6: mi bshor dri zhim skyes bu yi //
T03D3787:205b-7: yid ni 'phrog par byed pa dang //
T03D3787:205b-8: dpal gyi be'u dang bkra shis ni //
T03D3787:205b-9: sangs rgyas dpe byad bzang por bzhed //
T03D3787:205b-10: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bshad zin to /
T03D3787:205b-12: // /'di gnyis kyi bshad pa ni sprul pa'i sku'i phrin
T03D3787:205b-13: las ston pa'i mdo las 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T03D3787:205b-14: chos kyi sbyin pa'i bsdu ba'i dngos po nyid kyis
T03D3787:205b-16: des na dang por ma gsungs so //
T03D3787:205b-17: sprul pa'i sku gang zhe na /
T03D3787:205b-18: gang gis srid pa ji srid par //
T03D3787:205b-19: 'gro la phan pa sna tshogs dag / mnyam du mdzad pa'i sku de ni //
T03D3787:205b-20: thub pa'i sprul sku rgyun mi chad //
T03D3787:205b-24: des na 'di phan chad ni 'bras bu'i gnas skabs
T03D3787:205b-25: rnam pa thams cad legs par yongs su rdzogs pa'i
T03D3787:205b-26: chos kyi sku thob pa ni 'khor ba ji srid
T03D3787:205b-27: par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su sprul
T03D3787:205b-28: pa rnams kyis lhun gyis grub cing rgyun mi 'chad
T03D3787:205b-29: par sems can gyi don sna tshogs pa 'jug par
T03D3787:205b-30: byed pa'i sgo nas gnas yongs su gyur pa'i phrin
T03D3787:205b-31: las kyi dbang du mdzad do //
T03D3787:205b-32: bcom ldan 'das rmi lam lta bu dngos po med pa dang /
T03D3787:205b-33: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
T03D3787:205b-34: rang gi mtshan nyid kyi stong pa'i chos rnams la dge ba dang /
T03D3787:205b-37: 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya ba la sogs
T03D3787:205b-38: pa ji ltar gzhag ces bya ba'i dri ba de'i
T03D3787:205b-39: mdzad pa nye bar 'god pa'i don dang /
T03D3787:205b-40: rab 'byor 'di la byis pa so so skye bo
T03D3787:205b-41: thos pa dang ldan pas ni rmi lam yang mi
T03D3787:205b-42: dmigs so zhes bya ba nas brtsams pa 'khor ba'i
T03D3787:205b-43: rmi lam la dgongs pa dang /
T03D3787:205b-44: rmi lam mthong ba yang mi dmigs so zhes bya
T03D3787:205b-45: ba de las sad pa'i gang zag la dgongs pa
T03D3787:205b-46: dang / dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
T03D3787:205b-47: sangs rgyas dag la de mi mnga' bar gsungs pas
T03D3787:205b-48: dris pa'i lan bstan pas te /
T03D3787:206a-1: ji lta ba bzhin du nyon mongs pa dang shes
T03D3787:206a-2: bya'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po nye bar mi dmigs pa
T03D3787:206a-3: shes par byed pa'i don can dang /
T03D3787:206a-4: dka' ba byed pa rnams kyi chos rnam par gzhag
T03D3787:206a-5: par bya dka' ba ngo mtshar che ba nyid du
T03D3787:206a-9: yang chos kyi sku'i phrin las rnam pa du zhig yin zhe na /
T03D3787:206a-10: 'gro rnams zhi ba'i las dang ni //
T03D3787:206a-11: bsdu rnams bzhi la 'god pa dang //
T03D3787:206a-12: kun nas nyon mongs bcas pa yi //
T03D3787:206a-13: rnam par byang ba rtogs pa dang //
T03D3787:206a-14: bdag nyid ji bzhin sems can gyi //
T03D3787:206a-15: don dang pha rol phyin drug dang //
T03D3787:206a-16: sangs rgyas lam dang rang bzhin gyis //
T03D3787:206a-17: stong pa nyid dang gnyis zad dang //
T03D3787:206a-18: brda dang dmigs pa med pa dang //
T03D3787:206a-19: lus can rnams ni yongs smin dang //
T03D3787:206a-20: byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang ni //
T03D3787:206a-21: mngon par zhen pa bzlog pa dang //
T03D3787:206a-22: byang chub thob dang rgyal ba'i zhing //
T03D3787:206a-23: rnam par dag dang nges pa dang //
T03D3787:206a-24: sems can don ni tshad med dang //
T03D3787:206a-25: sangs rgyas bsten sogs yon tan dang //
T03D3787:206a-26: byang chub yan lag las rnams ni //
T03D3787:206a-27: chud mi za dang bden mthong dang //
T03D3787:206a-28: phyin ci log ni spang pa dang //
T03D3787:206a-29: de gzhi med pa'i tshul dang ni //
T03D3787:206a-30: rnam par byang dang tshogs dang ni //
T03D3787:206a-32: tha dad yongs su mi shes dang //
T03D3787:206a-34: chos kyi sku yi phrin las 'di //
T03D3787:206a-35: rnam pa nyi shu bdun du bzhed //
T03D3787:206a-37: de la 'gro ba rnams zhi ba'i phrin las ni 'gro ba rnam pa lngas bsdus pa yin te /
T03D3787:206a-38: gang gi phyir dmyal ba'i 'gro ba zhi ba'i phrin las kyi dbang du mdzad nas /
T03D3787:206a-39: rab 'byor 'di la ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis
T03D3787:206a-40: gzigs na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na byang
T03D3787:206a-41: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag bsams bzhin
T03D3787:206a-42: du sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su song
T03D3787:206a-43: ste zhes bya ba nas brtsams nas sems can de
T03D3787:206a-44: dag de nas thar te theg pa gsum po dag
T03D3787:206a-45: gis rim gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong ngo
T03D3787:206b-0: phyogs @206b bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dud 'gro'i
T03D3787:206b-1: skye gnas kyi sems can rnams kyi don du bdag
T03D3787:206b-2: yongs su gtong ba la sogs pas dud 'gro'i skye
T03D3787:206b-3: gnas zhi ba'i phrin las dang /
T03D3787:206b-4: de bzhin du yi dags kyi yul gyi sdug bsngal
T03D3787:206b-5: rgyun gcod pas gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal
T03D3787:206b-7: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug la chos
T03D3787:206b-8: bstan pa'i rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis yongs su
T03D3787:206b-10: tshangs pa rnams kyi lta ba'i rnam pa dang phral
T03D3787:206b-11: ba na lha'i 'gro ba zhi ba'i phrin las dang
T03D3787:206b-12: / rab 'byor 'di la ngas sangs rgyas kyi spyan
T03D3787:206b-13: gyis 'jig rten la gzigs na byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3787:206b-14: rnams ni mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud
T03D3787:206b-15: par byed de zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
T03D3787:206b-16: rgya cher sems can rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad
T03D3787:206b-17: mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa'i 'di ni 'phags
T03D3787:206b-18: pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu yin par brjod do
T03D3787:206b-19: zhes bya ba'i bar 'dis ni mi'i 'gro ba zhi
T03D3787:206b-21: gal te byang chub sems dpas kyang sems can rnams
T03D3787:206b-22: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed
T03D3787:206b-23: pa de lta yin na sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T03D3787:206b-24: sems dpa' la khyad par med par thal bas brtsad
T03D3787:206b-25: pa dang / gnyi ga'ang ched du bya ba gcig pa yin gyi /
